title: Children of the street
creator_credit: Via le Monde and Francois Fioquet
brief_description: Looks at lives of two newspaper boys in Caracas, Venezuela, who work up to nine hours a day to make a living on the streets of a tough city, and to earn money for an education. Useful as a comparison with a lifestyle very different to that experienced by most Australian children.
